'''Map markers''' are [[entities]] exclusive to the ''[[Bedrock Editor]]''.

== Spawning ==
Map markers do not spawn naturally. Found only in ''Bedrock Editor'', [[spawn egg]]s exist in the spawn egg group in the [[Creative inventory]]. They can also be summoned using the {{cmd|summon}} command.

== Behavior ==
* '''Map Marker''': Continues rotating counterclockwise. At this time, triggers the particle “editor:selected_marker”.<br>
* '''Location Pointer Selected''': Continues rotating slowly counterclockwise.<br>
* '''Location Pointer Idle''': No particular behavior.<br>
* '''Ruler Pointer Selected''': No special behavior.<br>
* '''Ruler Idle''': No special behavior.

== Usage　==
In ''Bedrock Editor'', it is used as a marker when using tools.
